ddba1b69f43cbb885e178dfaafa120f1fe196a13.commitMessage:
[FLINK-7251] [types] Remove the flink-java8 module and improve lambda type extraction

This commit removes the flink-java8 module and merges some tests into flink-core/flink-runtime. It ensures to have the possibility for passing explicit type information in DataStream API as a fallback. Since the tycho compiler approach was very hacky and seems not to work anymore, this commit also removes all references in the docs and quickstarts.

This closes #6120.
ddba1b69f43cbb885e178dfaafa120f1fe196a13.actualSource:
public <R> SingleOutputStreamOperator<R> map(CoMapFunction<IN1, IN2, R> coMapper) {

		TypeInformation<R> outTypeInfo = TypeExtractor.getBinaryOperatorReturnType(
			coMapper,
			CoMapFunction.class,
			0,
			1,
			2,
			TypeExtractor.NO_INDEX,
			getType1(),
			getType2(),
			Utils.getCallLocationName(),
			true);

		return transform("Co-Map", outTypeInfo, new CoStreamMap<>(inputStream1.clean(coMapper)));

	}

23d8e26438370d8c99c24c8b43d543e953775fd2.commitMessage:
[FLINK-2550] Rename ConnectedDataStream to ConnectedStreams, Remove some operations

The removed operations are tricky and some of them are not working
correctly. For now, co-reduce, stream-cross and stream-join are
removed.

I'm planning to add a new join implementation based on tagged union
that uses the new windowing code.
